title: Bloomberg's Waral on FB, AMC's Mohtashami on Home Sales (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Waral on FB, AMC's Mohtashami on Home Sales (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUESTS: Jitendra Waral, Global Internet and Consumer Electronics Analyst, on Facebook signing deals with celebrities and media companies for Facebook Live. Logan Mohtashami, Senior Loan Officer, AMC Lending Group, weighs in on home sales and mortgage applications.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
